Factories

Class ViewHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Factories.ViewHandler

  • public class ViewHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing all the fxml files, their controllers and their view models for the GUI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewHandler(ViewModelFactory vmf)
      Initializes the stages

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void access()
      If the scene(access) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void config()
      If the scene(config) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void exit(int m)
      This method is responsible for exiting from a stage specified by the parameter
      void openAdminEntry()
      If the scene(adminAcces) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void openAdminLogs()
      If the scene(logs) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void openCustomerDemands()
      If the scene(cusDemand) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void openDemand()
      If the scene(demand) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void openMainAdmin()
      If the scene(main) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.

      If the scene(customer) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void openOrders()
      If the scene(orders) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void openStorage()
      If the scene(storage) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
      void start()
      Opens the openSystem view

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewHandler

        public ViewHandler(ViewModelFactory vmf)
        Initializes the stages
        Parameters:
        vmf - view model factory

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Opens the openSystem view

      • config

        public void config()
        If the scene(config) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object. Otherwise the method will return the already created scene. A title and the scene will be assigned to the stage.

      • access

        public void access()
        If the scene(access) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object. Otherwise the method will return the already created scene. A title and the scene will be assigned to the stage.

      • openMainCustomer

        public void openMainCustomer()
        If the scene(customer) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object. Otherwise the method will return the already created scene. A title and the scene will be assigned to the stage.

        If the scene(main) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object. Otherwise the method will return the already created scene. A title and the scene will be assigned to the stage.

      • exit

        public void exit(int m)
        This method is responsible for exiting from a stage specified by the parameter
        Parameters:
        m - int if 0 then closes stage 2 if 1 closes stage 3, if 2 closes stage 4, if 3 closes stage 5
